meanings.definition: The dead body of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The scavengers feasted on the carcasses.

meanings.sent2: The hunters left the deer carcasses in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The chef turned the carcasses into a delicious stew.
meanings.sent4: The factory processed the chicken carcasses for sale.
